name: Nachzehrer
description: The Nachzehrer is a medium undead creature that embodies the horrors of death and disease, with painful pustules and an ominous presence.
memorable: Notable for its disease-infecting abilities that weaken foes over time.
goals: To spread disease and weaken its enemies through necrotic influence.
relations: May serve or be found alongside other undead or evil creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, damp areas or locations associated with death.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores allow it to inflict heavy damage and withstand attacks.
weaknesses: Low Charisma score may hinder social interactions and manipulation.
attacks: Can deliver a devastating bite attack that inflicts necrotic damage and drain hit points from targets.
most_powerful_ability: Grave Pox inflicts vulnerability to necrotic damage and causes exhaustion that cannot be removed normally.
senses: Possesses darkvision with a passive Perception of 12.
skills: Profound in stealth, making it difficult to detect before it strikes.
additional_information: Inflicts diseases that are highly contagious.
Can perform a Multiattack with three effective strikes.
The Grave Pox disease is particularly debilitating, preventing normal exhaustion recovery.
Weakening Shadow ability lowers opponents' effectiveness in combat.
Restores its health by draining the maximum hit points from targets.
test_queries: chaotic evil creature that drains health
undead that weakens enemies in battle
